name: ElpisCrowdsale

attributes.documentation:
@dev The Ownable constructor sets the original `owner` of the contract to the sender
account.
@dev Throws if called by any account other than the owner.
attributes.name: onlyOwner

attributes.documentation:
@dev Allows the current owner to transfer control of the contract to a newOwner.
@param _newOwner The address to transfer ownership to.
attributes.name: transferOwnership

attributes.documentation: @dev Multiplies two numbers, throws on overflow.
attributes.name: mul

attributes.documentation: @dev Integer division of two numbers, truncating the quotient.
attributes.name: div

attributes.documentation: @dev Subtracts two numbers, throws on overflow (i.e. if subtrahend is greater than minuend).
attributes.name: sub

attributes.documentation: @dev Adds two numbers, throws on overflow.
attributes.name: add

attributes.documentation: @dev Modifier to make a function callable only when the contract is stopped.
attributes.name: whenStopped

attributes.documentation: @dev Modifier to make a function callable only when the contract is not stopped.
attributes.name: whenNotStopped

attributes.documentation: @dev called by the owner to stop, triggers stopped state
attributes.name: stop

attributes.documentation: @dev called by the owner to restart, triggers restarted state
attributes.name: restart

attributes.documentation:
@dev enables withdrawals, only callable by the owner when the withdrawals are disabled
@notice enables withdrawals, only callable by the owner when the withdrawals are disabled
attributes.name: enableWithdrawal

attributes.documentation:
@dev disables withdrawals, only callable by the owner when the withdrawals are enabled
@notice disables withdrawals, only callable by the owner when the withdrawals are enabled
attributes.name: disableWithdrawal

attributes.documentation:
Event for logging contract stopping
@param owner who owns the contract
attributes.name: Stopped

attributes.documentation:
Event for logging contract restarting
@param owner who owns the contract
attributes.name: Restarted

attributes.documentation:
Event for logging enabling withdrawals
@param owner who owns the contract
attributes.name: WithdrawalEnabled

attributes.documentation:
Event for logging disabling withdrawals
@param owner who owns the contract
attributes.name: WithdrawalDisabled

attributes.documentation:
@dev The Whitelist constructor sets the original `whitelister` of the contract to the sender
account.
@dev Throws if called by any account other than the whitelister.
attributes.name: onlyWhitelister
addToWhitelist
removeFromWhitelist
isWhitelisted
changeWhitelister
WhitelisterChanged
WhitelistAdd
WhitelistRemove

attributes.documentation:
@dev Sets the USD/ETH rate
@param _rate USD/ETH rate
attributes.name: setRate

attributes.documentation:
@dev Sets the threshold
@param _threshold Maximum wei contribution for non-whitelisted addresses
attributes.name: setThreshold

attributes.documentation: @dev fallback function ***DO NOT OVERRIDE***

@dev low level token purchase ***DO NOT OVERRIDE***
@param _beneficiary Address performing the token purchase
attributes.name: buyTokens
withdraw
claimTokens
_getTokenAmount
_getUsdAmount
getPhase
TokenPurchase
RateChanged
ThresholdChanged
Contribution
NeedKyc
Withdrawal
ClaimedTokens
